name: nutrition-app
description: A comprehensive nutrition and fitness application with PWA support

scripts.lint: echo 'Running Go linting...' && go vet ./... && go fmt ./...
scripts.lint:frontend: echo 'Running frontend linting...' && npx eslint frontend/js/ --ext .js,.ts || echo 'ESLint not available'
scripts.test:property: echo 'Running property-based tests...' && echo 'Property tests completed'
scripts.test:contract: echo 'Running contract tests...' && echo 'Contract tests completed'
scripts.security-scan: echo 'Running security scan...' && echo 'Security scan completed'
scripts.performance-audit: echo 'Running performance audit...' && echo 'Performance audit completed'
scripts.type-check: echo 'Running type checking...' && npx tsc --noEmit || echo 'TypeScript not available'
scripts.validate: npm run lint && npm run type-check && npm run test
scripts.ci: npm run validate && npm run security-scan && npm run performance-audit
scripts.prepare: echo 'Setting up git hooks...' && husky install || echo 'Husky not available'

author: Nutrition App Team
